channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [SGP][Virtual Private Servers] - Network maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 29, 07:00 - 09:00 UTC

Jul 10, 18:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the VPS region SGP.

Start time : 29/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 29/07/2025 09:00 UTC
Service impact : The network of all VPS located in the region SGP will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss. The packet loss will happen once per service during the maintenance window.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure.


Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX][Dedicated Servers] - Room W31 Maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 28, 18:00 UTC  -  Aug 1, 02:00 UTC

Jul 8, 22:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offering in room W31.

Start time : 28/07/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 01/08/2025 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Public network will be unreachable on room W31 during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment to improve general performance.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX/SBG][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 16, 04:30 - 10:00 UTC

Jun 30, 17:49 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

Start time : 16/07/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 16/07/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS2/BHS6][Storage] - Storage and Backups maintenance notification
item.description:
Jul 15, 08:12 UTC
Completed - The maintenance is completed, all services are operational.

Jul 14, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 23, 09:00 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Storage and Backups offer.

Start time : 14/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 15/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Lowered performance during maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will upgrade major version of block storage software to next stable release.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack S346A03
item.description:
Jul 15, 07:37 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Dedicated Servers offering on the rack S346A03 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 15/07/2025 03:15 UTC
End time : 15/07/2025 07:33 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jul 15, 03:28 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering on the rack S346A03.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 15/07/2025 03:15 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the rack S346A03 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers located on the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [DE1/2][Virtual Private Servers] - Instances incident notification

End time : 15/07/2025 04:07 UTC

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

item.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 46D17 / 46D20 / 46D21 / 46D22 / 46D23 /46D25

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
